item.title: Yip
item.description: A Rust TCP server that responds with callers’ IPv4 address About This server is the counter part to mip. It responds with the callers’ IP address on request. That’s it. Usage Cargo Run the server with cargo run, then connect to it on port 8111. Binary Build the binary for your system with cargo. $ cargo build --release Then copy the binary from target/release/yip to some place in your $PATH. Afterwards the server can be started by running yip.
